myFunction.value:
# Parsed comments (get added to final function file) cannot be in root
say hello world
tellraw @a {"text":"this is an eval block -> a string var"}
say Number is less than 4
say for loop
say Num 0
say Num 1
say Num 2
say Num 3
say foreach loop
say Num 0
say Num 1
say Num 2
say Num 3
execute @a ~ ~ ~ say Hello World
function myNamespace:callAMacro if @a[score_hello=1]

callAMacro.value:
tellraw @a[score_hello_min=1] {"text":"Hello, my name is John."}
say 5

changes.value:
execute @a ~ ~ ~ say hello world
say @a[some_score=5]
say ~5
